MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L14 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Pilch Lane, Gordon Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.40AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the loss of power and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.45AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.55AM on 14th March 2021.
